Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes municipalities to purchase private residential real property located in a floodplain
Summary: Authorizes municipalities to purchase private residential real property located in a floodplain.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to authorizing municipalities to purchase private residential real property located in a floodplain
